mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`shopping_cart_type` as 'shoppingCartType', a.`customer_id` as 'customerId', a.`sku_id` as 'skuId', a.`num` as 'num', a.`goods_name` as 'goodsName', a.`goods_code` as 'goodsCode', a.`goods_price` as 'goodsPrice', a.`sku_specifications` as 'skuSpecifications',
from `t_order_shopping_cart_item` as a
